short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the Blue Checkmarks and Filter out ALL the Ads and Promotioned Tweets with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the Blue Checkmarks on Twitter and Filter out ALL the Ads and Promoted Tweets with ease.  This cleans up your feed when browsing via the web and allows you to quickly find and block all the Twitter "promoters" so that you won't see their advertisements in the app as well.  All users that you don't follow with a PAID blue check are added to an easy to use list for blocking without having to go to their pages first.  Makes Twitter a nice experience again (at least on the web).  Does NOT track any user data,  I made this tool to improve my experience on Twitter and am happy to share it with others.  Donate to my listed ETH account if you want to help this project survive.  Share with your friends on Twitter!
